attributes.action: introduce legislation to reduce the amount paid to Scotland from English Taxes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the PM to reduce the fiscal dependancy of Scotland on the ever more hard pressed English people.  The people of Scotland are to: enjoy free prescriptions; denied to the English: enjoy free care for the elderley; denied to the English: Scotish Students are to be exemt tuition fees; denied to the English Student: Scotish Patientsa have access to drugs that are denied to English Patients.  These actions are patently unjust and should be addressed by Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
